org.mcarthur.sandy.gwt.event.list.client
Class ListEvent

java.lang.Object
  java.util.EventObject
      org.mcarthur.sandy.gwt.event.list.client.ListEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ListEvent
extends EventObject

Event encapsulates changes to an EventList.

Author:
Sandy McArthur
See Also:

Constructor Detail

ListEvent

public ListEvent(EventList source,
                 org.mcarthur.sandy.gwt.event.list.client.ListEvent.ListEventType type,
                 int index)
          throws IllegalArgumentException
Constructs a ListEvent for one element. This is the same as calling ListEvent(EventList, org.mcarthur.sandy.gwt.event.list.client.ListEvent.ListEventType, int, int) with sequential indexes.

Parameters:
source - The EventList on which the ListEvent initially occurred.
type - one of ADDED, CHANGED, or REMOVED.
index - affected element.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if source is null.

ListEvent

public ListEvent(EventList source,
                 org.mcarthur.sandy.gwt.event.list.client.ListEvent.ListEventType type,
                 int indexStart,
                 int indexEnd)
          throws IllegalArgumentException
Constructs a ListEvent for a range of elements. If needed indexStart and indexEnd will be transposed to keep them in numerical order.

Parameters:
source - The EventList on which the ListEvent initially occurred.
type - one of ADDED, CHANGED, or REMOVED.
indexStart - one end of the interval.
indexEnd - one end of the interval.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if source is null.
